title: Francesco Farioli - Wikipedia
snippet: On 23 May 2024, Farioli was appointed head coach of Dutch club Ajax, signing a three-year contract and becoming the club's first Italian manager.

title: Francesco Farioli new Ajax head coach
snippet: On Thursday, Francesco Farioli was presented as Ajax's new head coach in the Johan Cruijff ArenA. The Italian signed a three-year contract and looks forward to his time in Amsterdam.

title: Ajax appoint Francesco Farioli as new head coach - ESPN
snippet: Ajax confirmed the appointment of Francesco Farioli as their new head coach on a three-year contract on Thursday.

title: Who is Francesco Farioli, Ajax’s new head coach? — Ajax Daily
snippet: In a significant move, Ajax appointed Francesco Farioli as their new head coach at the end of May, replacing temporary boss John van ‘t Schip in the Dutch capital. The Italian boss, who is highly rated in the game, signed a three-year deal ...

title: Francesco Farioli decides to leave Ajax
snippet: Francesco Farioli has decided to leave Ajax after careful consideration. The head coach has informed the club’s board of his decision.
